field.title_expr: ( err = get_last_run_error_str() ), err != '' ? err : ( get_last_run_start_date() != null ? 'OK' : '' )

dyn_filter.title: Не показывать отклоненных

field.title_expr: ( spot = spots.GetOptChildByKey( filter.ChildExists( 'spots__spot__vacancy_id' ) ? filter.spots__spot__vacancy_id : filter.active_vacancy_id ), StrDate( ( spot != undefined ? spot.state_date : state_date ), false ) )

field.elem_expr: ( spot = spots.GetOptChildByKey( filter.ChildExists( 'spots__spot__vacancy_id' ) ? filter.spots__spot__vacancy_id : filter.active_vacancy_id ), ( spot != undefined ? spot.state_id : state_id ) )

dyn_filter.xquery_qual_expr: base1_config.use_sql_storage ? ( 'PathExists( $elem/skills, \'skill\[type_id="' + skills__skill__type_id + '"]' + ( skills__skill__level_id.HasValue ? '[level_id>=' + skills__skill__level_id + ']' : '' ) + '\' )' ) : ( base1_config.use_ft_v2 ? ( 'doc-contains( $elem/id, \'\', \'skill.' + skills__skill__type_id + ' >= ' + ( skills__skill__level_id.HasValue ? StrInt( skills__skill__level_id, 4 ) : '0000' ) + '\', \'candidate\' )' ) : ( 'doc-contains( $elem/id, \'\', \'[skill.' + skills__skill__type_id + '>=' + ( skills__skill__level_id.HasValue ? StrInt( skills__skill__level_id, 4 ) : '' ) + ']\', \'candidate\' )' ) )

action.title: Добавить источник
action.code: subDoc = DefaultDb.OpenNewObjectDoc( 'raw_storage', lib_voc.obtain_next_voc_elem_id( raw_storages ) ); CreateDocScreen( subDoc );
